resources.string: Welcome lib is a simple library that allows you show a fancy tipical intro with few (non-hard) configuration.
Click next button to watch a live sample

When you start it, a new activity will appear with a ViewPager inside for each step and three buttons: Next, Skip and Done. If you press Done or Skip then the previews requested nextIntent will start and the activity will be finished.
Sample app has finsished. If you have a suggest or you want report an issue please contact us in our github repository!
If you want, you can try sample again clicking in next button
